|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = HLZUWA2, Z7ZMAXMEDIAWIFI2 |icid = 1754A-UWA2 |boardid = 10G030700-0C |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192DU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "CC&C WL-6210-V3" and "10G030700-0C" is silkscreened on the board. :This dongle is targeted for use with certain '''Acer''' projectors.
==See also== *[[Acer UWA2]] - USB WiFi Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA2 HLZUWA2] (2013-04-19) :OEM: [[CC&C WL-6210-V3]] ([[CC&C]]) *[[Acer UWA3]] - USB Wireless Adapter :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA3 HLZUWA3] (2014-07-18) *[[Acer UWA4]] - Wireless Projection Kit :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HLZUWA4 HLZUWA4] (2018-04-25)
